ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof Sharp CCD Security CCTV Camera with Night Vision, Indoor / Outdoor Used. With 36 IR LEDs, The View Distance Can Up to Be 30 Meters Long.
Image Sensor: 1/4 Sharp CCD, The Length of Lens: 6 mm. PAL Effective Pixels: 752 (H) x 582 (V).IR LED: - 36PCS, - Diameters: 5mm.
420 TV Lines Horizontal Resolution. Backlight Compensation: ON. White Balance: Auto.
Minimum Illumination: 0.000 LUX x F1.2(IR LED ON). Nighttime (IR) Viewing Distance: 30 Meters.
Waterproof Level: IP66. Aluminum Alloy Housing Material.
ProductInfo.Name: BW® 4/Pack , 420 TV Lines 1/4 Inch Sharp CCD Weatherproof Surveillance CCTV Camera, Video Security Camera System with 36 IR Infrared LEDs, Day Color Vision / Night Black White Vision, Indoor / Outdoor Used
